General.Name: Anghami Inc. Warrants
General.Description: Anghami Inc. operates a digital music entertainment technology platform in the Middle East and North Africa. It offers a music application and platform that provides Arabic and international music to stream and download. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Abu Dhabi, the United Arab Emirates.
General.Address: Al-Khatem Tower, WeWork Hub 71, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates
